thread.title: Fans go wild as Rita Ora and Justin Bieber collaborate on a song together
thread.title_full: Fans go wild as Rita Ora and Justin Bieber collaborate on a song together

author: Joshua Haigh
title: Fans go wild as Rita Ora and Justin Bieber collaborate on a song together
text:
Showbiz Fans go wild as Rita Ora and Justin Bieber collaborate on a song together The America's Next Top Model host has been teasing new music for the past few years, and fans have been growing tired of waiting Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Rita Ora and Justin Bieber share music collaboration video Share this video Get daily   Could   
Rita Ora looks set to finally make a return to music. 
The former pop star, who hasn't released an album in over half a decade, has teased that she could be collaborating with one of the biggest stars in the world. 
The America's Next Top Model host took to Snapchat to sing along to K-Ci and JoJo's classic ballad All My Life while Justin Bieber played the piano. 
Despite not performing a new song, fans immediately went into meltdown over suggestions that the pair could be working on new music together. Justin played piano while Rita sang (Photo: RItaOra/snapchat) Rita Ora might be working on new music (Photo: Splash News) 
"Are Justin Bieber & Rita Ora Collaborating?!" wrote one excited fan on Twitter. 
Justin's appearance on Rita's Snapchat comes as the Cold Water singer made a return to Instagram. Justin made a return to Instagram for a new advert (Photo: T-Mobile) He quit the social media site last year (Photo: T-Mobile) 
His return to the social media site was part of the #UnlimitedMoves spot for the big game as he shared it with his fans online. 
After quitting the site last year, he said: "Instagram is for the devil. I think Hell is Instagram. I'm like 90 percent sure. 
"We get sent to hell and we get locked in the Instagram server. I'm stuck in the DMs. I'm trying to climb my way out and I can't." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
